name: Breaking the Ice
description:
Breaking the Ice

Breaking the Ice is a puzzle game that has you control an ice ball on its way to a cool refreshing drink!

By using your abilities to shrink and grow you must solve each level, ultimately reaching your goal of cooling down a tasty beverage.

Slow Jam 2019 Submission.

Controls:

Enter: Start Game

WASD : Movement

Left Click : Shrink Object

Right Click : Enlarge Object

R: Restart Level
